Tablet of Vision: Countless thoughts beyond comprehension sear painfully into your brain. You hear the faint whisper of a woman's voice. You see a vision of a male Elf, singing to thunderous applause! You once read about him in a book called "Critique of Biel's Song". Could he have the next Stone of Commune? He's waiting at the next Tablet of Vision, in the northeast corner of the Ketra Orc Outpost!
